title: How to set your gear shifter.

posts.content:
Hi guys, I've just rebuilt my gear shifter which was fully standard before strip down. On the rebuild I've added a quick shift device which sits o top of the selector plate. I got all gears but they are not clean in selection.

Is there a way of setting this up to gain a clean gear selection.

Cheers,

Richard.

author.location: Bridgnorth, Shropshire. I am a member :o)

posts.content:
Have a look through here - some very useful advice....

http://www.vw-resource.com/plateadj.html

Finally got round to try and get this clean gear selection and I think I've totally messed up now. Before I adjusted the plate position I had all four gears in selection a little sticky in selection but there. Adjusted the plate tried the gears again and it's stuck in a position which I can't move.

I hope it's nothing wrong in the transmission end Cap end and its just stuck. I can rotate the wheels by hand so I'm guessing it's not stuck in gear but just jammed.

Anyone got any ideas,
Richard.
